Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for purchasing IXM Link. Your license details are given below:
Access Control Panel: <ACP Name>
Number of devices: <License purchased for how many devices>
License Key: <License Key>
To activate your IXM Link license, follow these steps:
Open IXM WEB and login Expand Left Navigation Panel Click License tab Select the required Access Control Panel manufacturer Enter the License Key given above and click Activate
IXM Link should be activated and ready to use.
Enjoy the Experience!
For any queries, contact Invixium Technical Services Team.
